data.name: TAYAL - OST
data.detailed_description:
DO YOU LIKE THE MUSIC OF TAYAL IN GAME?
THEN THIS CONTENT IS RIGHT FOR YOU.



01 - PROLOGUE (OPENING)
02 - START THE JOURNEY (TITLE SCREEN)
03 - PREPARE TO GO (STAGE SELECT)
04 - GO AHEAD (STAGE SELECTED)
05 - FROZEN DREAM (ICEFIELD STAGE)
06 - HIDDEN RAIN (WETLAND STAGE)
07 - BURNING OUT (VOLCANO STAGE)
08 - STORM RUSH (WILDNESS STAGE)
09 - NEVER FORGET (TEMPLE STAGE)
10 - HIGH TENSION (CANYON STAGE)
11 - OUT OF SHADOW (CAVE STAGE)
12 - FLASH IN THE FOREST (JUNGLE STAGE)
13 - THE GRAND GODIANS (BOSS FIGHT)
14 - I KNOW I CAN (STAGE CLEAR)
15 - THE POWER OF NATURAL (GET A NEW FORCE)
16 - NEED AN ANSWER (EVENT)
17 - THINGS CHANGED (FLOATING ISLAND MENU)
18 - EVIL OF THE DEEP (LAKE STAGE)
19 - RESURRECTED MEMORIES (DESERT STAGE)
20 - WE ARE THE GODIANS (RUIN STAGE)
21 - TIME OF AWAKENING (FINAL STAGE)
22 - IT'S OUR FIGHT! (FLOATING ISLAND'S BOSS)
23 - FINISH THE FIGHT (FINAL BOSS FIGHT)
24 - GO TAKE A BIGGER DREAM (ENDING EVENT)
25 - AFTER US (ENDING)
26 - YOU WERE THERE (STAFF ROLL)
27 - STAND BY (MENU)
28 - STRANGE WORLD (PROTOTYPE STAGE)
29 - HODL. (GAME OVER)

MUSIC BY KILLERBLOOD

data.supported_languages: Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, English

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windwos XP, Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 150 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics above
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
